games_library.comment: Every card in My Games uses column size 3.
Every card in All Games uses column size 4.
When needed, we use products to specify configurations at the product level.

products.comment: Arcane in Special Events uses the whole width to display the card

games_library.comment: Every card in Thunderdome uses column size 4.
